title: The Jackbox Naughty Pack
notes: Steam shows Mostly Negative: 30% positive of 357 reviews; Steambase player score 33/100. Score reflects strong negative sentiment.
raw_comment: 3 party games, phones as controllers: Fakin’ It All Night Long, Dirty Drawful, Let Me Finish. 3 to 8 players + 10,000 audience members📱 8 phones using browsers. 🖥️ Phones + shared screen.
